plugins.name: Autosave
plugins.description: Saves all files when Enki loses focus.
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: C/C++ File Switch
plugins.description: Switch between C++ header and source file in Mamba text editor.
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: Fileswitcher
plugins.description: Switch through your files in the style of the Opera web browser.
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: File Preview
plugins.description: Preview plugin for HTML based documents, like HTML, Markdown, reStructuredText, Sphinx and CodeChat
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: Open Terminal
plugins.description: Open a terminal from Mamba text editor.
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: Python Linter
plugins.description: Lint Python source files using flake8
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: REPL
plugins.description: A REPL integration for Python, MIT Scheme and Standard ML
plugins.author: Marco Laspe

plugins.name: VIM Tutor
plugins.description: A simple VIM tutor for Mamba text editor vim model
plugins.author: Marco Laspe
